DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test probiotic administer healthy female subject dairy format skin health benefit .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Probiotics Drinkable Yogurt Skin Health
DOC.detailed_description: This placebo-controlled , double blind , randomize , single center , human clinical trial aim assess influence probiotic skin health healthy female subject , administer food matrix period 5 month . It consist five group ( 40 subjects/group ) . The first group ( 1 ) subject receive acidify milk contain bacterial strain . The second group ( 2 ) receive acidify milk contain one specific probiotic strain . The third group ( 3 ) receive ferment milk contain standard mix yogurt bacterial strain . The fourth group ( 4 ) receive ferment milk , contain standard mix yogurt bacterial strain group 3 plus specific probiotic strain group 2 . Finally , fifth group ( 5 ) receive ferment milk , contain standard mix yogurt bacterial strain group 3 4 plus specific probiotic strain group 2 4 plus mix antioxidant . This study address whether : A.The bioefficacy specific probiotic strain influence milk matrix . B.Whether bacterial strain impact bioefficacy specific probiotic strain , validate whether bioefficacy relate entirely activity specific probiotic strain . C.Whether nutritional supplement impact bioefficacy specific probiotic strain .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman assess medical history standard medical examination Caucasian Age : 2555 ( inclusive ) Normal BMI â‰¤ 30 Skin type 1111 Regular Hormonal Cycle Having give his/her write informed consent Willing avoid consumption ferment dairy product Minimum consumption dark chocolate period study Smoker Pregnant lactate woman Post menopausal woman Heavy alcohol intake ( usually consume 3 standard drinks/day ) Intake chronic medication except oral contraceptive Vitamin and/or mineral and/or antioxidant supplementation 3 month precede initiation study throughout study . Having skin cancer genetic disposition skin cancer Regular exposure artificial UVR Daily exposure sun one week 2 month precede initiation study Planned vacation sun period study . Excessive tea drinker ( 2 cup day green black tea ) . Excessive consumer ferment dairy product ( 150g per day ) . Excessive consumer dark chocolate ( > 25g per day ) . Regular high exercise marathon Subject regularly take sauna ( dry wet ) swim daily . Subject expect comply treatment Currently participate participate another interventional clinical trial last 3 month prior begin study .
